def_cn: 离经叛道者;摈弃社会习俗者
def_en: If you describe someone as a drop-out, you disapprove of the fact that they have rejected the accepted ways of society, for example by not having a regular job.
A drop-out is someone who has left school or college before they have finished their studies.

def_cn: 退学的;辍学的;中途放弃的
def_en: If you refer to the drop-out rate, you are referring to the number of people who leave a school or college early, or leave a course or other activity before they have finished it.
